H0.text: Who painted 'The Fighting Temeraire'. J.M.W. Turner

H1.text: Who painted 'The Fighting Temeraire'. John Constable

H2.text: Who painted 'The Fighting Temeraire'. Claude Monet

A4.text: In 2005, Turner's The Fighting Temeraire was voted Britain's 'greatest painting' in a public poll organised by the BBC.
